name: Non Profit Membership Level
benefits: Access to member-only events (at a cost)

name: Bronze Membership Level
benefits: Enhanced listing in the online directory
Discounted rates for events and workshops

name: Silver Membership Level
benefits: Premium listing in the online directory
Significant discounts for events and workshops
Featured in one newsletter per year

name: Gold Membership Level
benefits: Top-tier listing in the online directory
Free admission to all chamber events
Featured in two newsletters per year
Priority access to business consulting services
